# supekku.scripts.lib.standards.creation_test

Tests for standard creation module.

## Classes

### TestCreateStandard

Tests for create_standard function.

**Inherits from:** unittest.TestCase

#### Methods

- `setUp(self) -> None`: Set up test fixtures.
- `test_create_standard_with_default_status(self) -> None`: Test creating a standard with 'default' status.

### TestGenerateNextStandardId

Tests for generate_next_standard_id function.

**Inherits from:** unittest.TestCase

#### Methods

- `setUp(self) -> None`: Set up test fixtures.
- `test_first_standard(self) -> None`: Test ID generation for first standard.
